title: unable to log in
body: when i log in to my account from lol launcher it always said invalid username/password combination but when i log in from browser i can log into my account. can anyone help me with this pls?

replies.body: Issues like this are usually due to being on the wrong region.  With the patcher open, double check your connected region on the top right to make sure you're on NA.  Hope that helps!
in the region settings, there is only PBE.

Oh.  :X  It sounds like you have the PBE client downloaded, so you won't be able to access live servers.  I suggest [downloading league of legends ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)from the official source, and you should be set!
Recovery my acoount could help too.
